query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS scheduled_mttr_mtbf_reports (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  target_type ENUM('device','machine','production_line') NOT NULL,
  target_id INT NOT NULL,
  target_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  frequency ENUM('daily','weekly','monthly') NOT NULL,
  day_of_week INT,
  day_of_month INT,
  time_of_day VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL DEFAULT '08:00',
  recipients TEXT NOT NULL,
  format ENUM('excel','pdf','both') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'excel',
  is_active INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  last_sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  last_sent_status ENUM('success','failed','pending'),
  last_sent_error TEXT,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_scheduled_mttr_target (target_type, target_id),
  INDEX idx_scheduled_mttr_active (is_active)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS scheduled_mttr_mtbf_reports (

  recipients TEXT NOT NULL,
  format ENUM('excel','pdf','both') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'excel',
  is_active INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  last_sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  last_sent_status ENUM('success','failed','pending'),
  last_sent_error TEXT,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_scheduled_mttr_target (target_type, target_id),
  INDEX idx_scheduled_mttr_active (is_active)
);
